class.name: BTComposite
class.brief_description: Base class for BT composite tasks.
class.description: Base class for all behavior tree composite tasks. Extend [code]BTComposite[/code] to create your own. Composite tasks can have one or more child tasks. A composite task will execute its child tasks in a certain order. Depending on the status returned by a child task, execution either continues to the next task in order or stops and a status is returned to the parent task.
